column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH- A 38-year-old Cambodian man has been confirmed to have COVID-19 virus. The man was one of four people who were directly in contact with a ------40-year-old Japanese man------ in Siem Reap. Two woman and another man have tested negative.------The Minister of Health
column5: made the announcement at a press conference on March 07
column6: 2020 at 6:00 PM at the Ministry of Health’s ground floor.------UPDATE: All schools in Siem Reap have been ordered to close for 14 days.
